processingResourceMetaData.name: DependencyCollectionReader
processingResourceMetaData.description:
For training dependency parsers.
Reads dependency nodes (lines) from a file and creates DependencyNode annotations. Optionally assigns all CONLL attributes.

configurationParameter.name: InputFormat
configurationParameter.description: The default is CONLL-x tab-delimited format, with underscores for empty fields. Options (case insensitive): MIN - 4 fields (ID, FORM, HEAD, DEPREL) MPOS - 5 fields (add POSTAG) MLEM - 5 fields (with LEMMA instead of POSTAG) DEP - 6 fields (with LEMMA and POSTAG) CONLL - 10 fields (add CPOSTAG, FEATS, PHEAD, PDEPREL)

configurationParameter.name: TrainingMode
configurationParameter.description: If TrainingMode is true, a ConllDependencyNode will be posted to the CAS corresponding to the input. If not, this is assumed to be a test mode, with only BaseTokens being posted to the CAS.
